column1: prompt
Restate the following statement in the form of a question. The cranes migrated south for the winter.
Generate a list of questions to ask someone to probe their understanding of a given topic. Military history
Find a metaphor to explain a complex concept. The internet
Produce a new slogan for a given brand. Safeway
Name three countries in Europe.
Add two adjectives to this sentence: "The _____ _____  cat purred quietly."
Rewrite this sentence to make it more effective: The vehicle must be moved.
Arrange the following words to form a sentence: Store, everyday, items, grocery.
Categorize this sentence according to its function: She brought me a sweater.
Edit this sentence to make it more concise: This person was somebody who was very kind to me.
Match the following noun with an appropriate verb: Night -

Summarize the following article in less than 50 words:

"The new composting program launched by the city has been proven to be successful. Surveys report that interest in composting has increased, leading to increased compost collection from residents. The collected compost is then used by the city in their parks and gardens."
Use the phrase "it grates on my nerves" in a sentence.
Describe a natural process using only 5 words.
Generate an analogy to compare two ideas.
Identify 3 ethical challenges that AI poses.
Create a metaphor to compare a heavy workload to an object.
Explain the main thesis of this philosophical essay. The meaning of life can be interpreted differently by different people, depending on their circumstances and beliefs.
Create a list of 4 tips to become a better public speaker.
Write a chararter sketch for a fictional character. Sue Smith
Classify the following series of numbers. 2, 4, 6, 8
Give three of the most important actions to protect the environment.
Tell me a synonym for 'happy'.
Generate questions to the statement: "A driving license is a legal document".
Generate an opening sentence for a poem on the theme of 'loneliness'.
What phrase can you use to respond to someone who says "Thank you?"
Create a class with three students, a teacher and a room number.
Convert this standard time to military time: 5:30 pm
Tell me a humorous quote about life.
What are the three states of matter?
Write a business email asking for a raise.
Generate a shopping list for weekly groceries.
Tell one interesting fact about the American Civil War.
Rewrite this sentence without changing its meaning. The teacher asked the students to hand in their essays.
Generate a dialogue between two customers arguing about price.
Add a clause to this sentence that is semantically consistent. I will leave my house
Name four different types of transportation.
Determine the type of the following word: incredible.
Reword this sentence using different words. The dog is sleeping.
What is the purpose of a library in a computer program?
Restate this sentence in different words. He's very ambitious and always wants to be the best.
Generate a name for a new nutrition bar.
Write an article about the use of AI in healthcare.
Generate a multiple choice question from this sentence. The Grand Canyon is one of the greatest attractions in Arizona.
Devise a writing prompt.
Transform this sentence from the passive voice to the active voice. The error was discovered by the manager.
Generate an example of a catchy title for a blog post explaining what is Machine Learning

Identify which of the options is the main argument of the passage. In recent years, the use of artificial intelligence has become increasingly widespread. AI is being used to automate processes, to increase efficiency, and to ramp up innovation across many industries. 

A) AI is rapidly becoming an essential part of the digital economy
B) AI is helping to drive the growth of digital businesses
C) AI is creating new opportunities for businesses in digital spaces
D) AI is becoming essential for the digitalization of business processes
Suggest a suitable phrase for the following definition: A situation in which there is much more work than can be completed.
Generate a query to search for information about the history of machine learning.
What is a major advantage of using a mobile app?
Generate a code to display a table with two columns.
Describe a famous painting.
How can I save money using Amazon?
Classify the following as a health benefit, risk, or unknown: eating fast food.
Name three benefits of time tracking.
List three factors that may cause communication difficulties.
What are three benefits of using cloud computing?
What are the three main components of an automated process?
Research the history of Isaac Newton and generate a summary.
List three elements of a successful brand.
Create a timeline showing the development of the car industry in the United States.
Generate questions for a math quiz.
Find out the average price of a home in the city of San Diego.
Write a short story involving two characters with opposite views.
Explain the term 'cultural appropriation'.
Generate a story about an unexpected meeting between two childhood friends who were apart for many years.
Summarize the recent development in the field of automated driving.
Divide a party of 10 into two even teams. Rohan, Sarah, Jane, Richard, Chloe, Mark, Lily, Harry, Olivia, and Sam

Write two paragraphs summarizing the key differences between a peach and an apple.

Generate a potential hashtag for a vacation in Paris.

Describe the difference between light and dark roast coffee.
Given the scenario, generate a list of three benefits of having a pet.
